bibl.title: The Falcon King: Ptolemy Philadelphus and the Karnak Ostracon.
Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008.

bibl.note: O. Karnak Inv. L.S. 462.4 [ed.: Edda Bresciani, La spedizione di Tolomeo II in Siria in un ostrakon demotico inedito da Karnak, Das ptolemäische Ägypten (Mainz am Rhein, 1978) pp. 31-37 et fig. 51 a]. - The King's epithet [nsw bỉk, or 'King-Falcon']. - Commentary and context. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Siân Thomas & John D. Ray, The Falcon King: Ptolemy Philadelphus and the Karnak Ostracon.

Mark Depauw & Yanne Broux (edd.), Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 231 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 331-344, 1 tabl., 6 figg.
